title: New: Midi Matilda – Ottawa
content:
Having caught onto San Francisco’s Midi Matilda fairly early on, it’s fantastic to see them leaving the nest and spreading their wings over the pages of other similar websites. New single Ottawa will undoubtedly do the same as it’s predecessors, with it’s upbeat, M83 synth pop slickness and insanely catchy chorus. Check it out below, and download their Red Light District EP via bandcamp.

Photo Credit – Bryan Byrne
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
